main.name: Tom Lim
main.description: Mechanic/Property Manager by trade, With a B.comm in Finance/Accounting.  Seeking new challenges in development.
main.bio: After working as a Mechanic for the past few years, I grew tired of the monotonous nature of my job.  After talking to a couple of friends who had successfully transitioned careers, I decided to take the plunge myself.  I believe my diverse background gives me many advantages, it shows that I am not only able to adapt to different environments. but that I am not afraid to take on challenges and learn something new.
